resources.string: Error receiving data from the site
Why is it important to use this app?

%1$sToday phishing is the most common type of fraud.%2$s%1$sThe purpose of the phishing attack is to steal personal data, funds from a bank card. One of the methods of phishing attacks is the use of a QR code containing a link to fake websites. QRishing is a name that is a mixture of the terms QR code and phishing.%2$s%1$sThe most common variant of this type of fraud is when QR codes containing a link to fake sites are neatly placed on top of legitimate codes or on advertising posters where the QR code was not provided by the owner of the advertisement.%2$s%1$sThis application will allow you to avoid getting on a malicious resource.
%1$sClick the \"Generate QR Code\" button and enter the data in the field to create a QR code image.%2$s%1$sClick the \"Scan QR Code\" button to recognize the QR code.
This is the flash icon. Click if you want to use the flash. Disabled by default.
This is the autofocus icon. press if you want to use manual focus. Enabled by default.
If you see the message \"Error receiving data from the site\", it is possible that the site is unavailable or there are network problems. Try scanning the QR code again.
Click this icon if you want to learn more about phishing.
